seo.title: 6 Steps for Integrating Digital Out-of-Home in Your Omnichannel Marketing Strategy
seo.description: Learn how to integrate DOOH in your broader media strategy for high-impact, cross-channel campaigns.

overtitle: Add a real-world touchpoint to your omnichannel campaigns
title: Learn how to integrate DOOH in your broader media strategy for high-impact, cross-channel campaigns
intro: Our six-step eBook will guide you through the process of getting started with DOOH via your omnichannel demand-side-platform, including:
list: Defining your campaign strategy and choosing the right DSP partner
Creating a DOOH campaign that supports your omnichannel mix
